message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10, with me taking the bigger share.  What do you say?
I'm not impressed with your first offer. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Take it or leave it!

Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you everything. How about we split it 60/40 this time?  This is my final offer, if you reject it, we'll have to keep playing and who knows what will happen with inflation!
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely. Take it or leave it!
